name: Project Aerubiks
description:
Had an idea to have a survival game that takes place on a Rubik's Cube. It's a very small casual experience where you craft items and hunt to survive as long as you can. Line up certain tiles to gather resources. 

HOW TO PLAY

  • Right click to rotate cube
  • Left click to select objects
  • Toggle the Rubik's button in the top left corner to switch modes from Rubik's mode to normal mode. When in Rubik's mode, you can flip sides. 
  • Drag edible items to the Rubiks button to eat. When you see the image change, release. 
  • To hunt, simply have arrows in your inventory and click an animal on the cube. If you have enough arrows to meet the requirement you would have successfully hunted it. 
  • To craft items, open the inventory bag and drag the appropriate items to the slots. 

CRAFTING LIST

  1. Arrows = Rock + Branch + Thread
  2.  Hammer = Branch + Rock
  3.  Healing Powder = Herb (x2) + Rock + Berries
